title: Page Break Not Occurring in PDF Preview for First Item
description: When previewing an attached file in PDF format, the page break in the first item is not happening as expected.
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF format, the page break in the first item does not occur.
EB: When previewing the file in PDF format, we expect the first page to be blank because the first item is set to 'pagebreakbefore: always.'
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the attached file in bug report 1228982.
